alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Iberia, southern Lafayette, northeastern Vermilion and west central St. Martin Parishes through 600 PM CDT... At 459 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maurice, or near Lafayette, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. High rainfall rates have the potential for localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Scott, St. Martinville, Broussard, Youngsville, Maurice, Cade, Coteau, Ridge, Parks and Milton. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 99 and 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lafayette; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion
